name: Lumpy the Gnome
description: Lumpy is just barely capable of moving logs from one location to another.
autoCollectMessage: Lumpy stumbles off with a load of $.

name: Rumpy the Gnome
description: Rumpy has an ugly butt-chin which has always encouraged him to move quickly enough to never be seen.
autoCollectMessage: Rumpy scurries off with a load of $.

name: Pumpy the Gnome
description: Pumpy is PUMPED to do work that needs to be done. It's like an addiction, man.
autoCollectMessage: Pumpy launches away with a load of $.

name: Thurgood the Dwarf
description: Thurgood barely qualifies as a dwarf. He's a big fan of dairy.
autoCollectMessage: Thurgood walks away with a load of $.

name: Dwarny the Dwarf
description: Dwarny is actually a gnome. Don't tell him!
autoCollectMessage: Dwarny scurries away with a load of $.

name: Threnden the Dwarf
description: Threnden lives to haul rocks from point A to point B.
autoCollectMessage: Threnden dashes off with a load of $.

name: Raka
description: One of the friendly Kushtaka, though not very skilled.
autoCollectMessage: Raka waddles away with a load of $.

name: Sloodle
description: Sloodle is an exceptional helper, rare among the Kushtaka.
autoCollectMessage: Sloodle quickly waddles away with a load of $.

name: Glindrear
description: A friendly Kushtaka, and extremely skilled, too.
autoCollectMessage: Grlindrear waddle-runs away with a load of $.

name: Snibbap
description: A disgusting creature. It's no surprise most goblins avoid being seen.

name: Skia the Monopod
description: A smith. She can assist you in converting ores into solid metal items.

name: Tolani Seba
description: A scout. She can find monsters for you to battle with.

name: Ruto
description: A gathering scout. She can find monsters for you to battle with and help gather the loot they drop.

name: Anthretagro
description: A man in a toga. You aren't sure where he came from but it doesn't seem like he belongs here.
autoCollectMessage: Anthretagro finds what you are looking for.

name: Kenbo Daito
description: A man who was trapped in the lighthouse dungeon for a very long time.

name: Testo
autoCollectMessage: Testo dashes off with a load of $.
